channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-27761|2024-09-16T17:14:24.541Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: Weak web transport security (Weak TLS): An attacker may be able to decrypt the data using attacks

item.title: CVE-2020-4107|2024-09-16T21:03:04.792Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20domino
item.description: HCL Domino is affected by an Insufficient Access Control vulnerability. An authenticated attacker with local access to the system could exploit this vulnerability to attain escalation of privileges, denial of service, or information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-27545|2024-09-16T17:03:59.379Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix
item.description: BigFix Web Reports authorized users may perform HTML injection for the email administrative configuration page.

item.title: CVE-2021-27765|2024-09-16T22:15:59.470Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: The BigFix Server API installer is created with InstallShield, which was affected by CVE-2021-41526, a vulnerability that could allow a local user to perform a privilege escalation. This vulnerability was resolved by updating to an InstallShield version with the underlying vulnerability fixed.

item.title: CVE-2022-27561|2024-09-16T20:32:02.245Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20traveler
item.description: There is a reflected Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in the HCL Traveler web admin (LotusTraveler.nsf).

item.title: CVE-2021-27770|2024-09-16T20:02:52.780Z -- hcl%20software -- sametime
item.description: The vulnerability was discovered within the “FaviconService”. The service takes a base64-encoded URL which is then requested by the webserver. We assume this service is used by the “meetings”-function where users can specify an external URL where the online meeting will take place.

item.title: CVE-2022-27560|2024-09-16T17:27:45.221Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20versionvault%20express
item.description: HCL VersionVault Express exposes administrator credentials.

item.title: CVE-2021-27784|2024-09-16T16:47:55.938Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20launch
item.description: The provided HCL Launch Container images contain non-unique HTTPS certificates and a database encryption key. The fix provides directions and tools to replace the non-unique keys and certificates. This does not affect the standard installer packages.

item.title: CVE-2021-27774|2024-09-16T22:01:38.548Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20digital%20experience
item.description: User input included in error response, which could be used in a phishing attack.

item.title: CVE-2021-27758|2024-09-16T20:12:17.004Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20inventory
item.description: There is a security vulnerability in login form related to Cross-site Request Forgery which prevents user to login after attacker spam to login and system blocked victim's account.

item.title: CVE-2021-27786|2024-09-16T21:04:10.396Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20onetest%20server
item.description: Cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) enables browsers to perform cross domain requests in a controlled manner. This request has an Origin header that identifies the domain that is making the initial request and defines the protocol between a browser and server to see if the request is allowed. An attacker can take advantage of this and possibly carry out privileged actions and access sensitive information when the Access-Control-Allow-Credentials is enabled.

item.title: CVE-2021-27768|2024-09-16T16:33:54.972Z -- hcl%20software -- verse%20for%20android
item.description: Using the ability to perform a Man-in-the-Middle (MITM) attack, which indicates a lack of hostname verification, sensitive account information was able to be intercepted. In this specific scenario, the application's network traffic was intercepted using a proxy server set up in 'transparent' mode while a certificate with an invalid hostname was active. The Android application was found to have hostname verification issues during the server setup and login flows; however, the application did not process requests post-login.

item.title: CVE-2021-27751|2024-09-16T22:09:06.365Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20commerce
item.description: HCL Commerce is affected by an Insufficient Session Expiration vulnerability. After the session expires, in some circumstances, parts of the application are still accessible.

item.title: CVE-2021-27777|2024-09-16T19:31:23.448Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20unica
item.description: XML External Entity (XXE) injection vulnerabilities occur when poorly configured XML parsers process user supplied input without sufficient validation. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to manipulate XML content and inject malicious external entity references.

item.title: CVE-2021-27767|2024-09-16T20:12:16.382Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: The BigFix Console installer is created with InstallShield, which was affected by CVE-2021-41526, a vulnerability that could allow a local user to perform a privilege escalation. This vulnerability was resolved by updating to an InstallShield version with the underlying vulnerability fixed.

item.title: CVE-2022-27548|2024-09-16T18:12:59.889Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20launch
item.description: HCL Launch stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local user.

item.title: CVE-2021-27785|2024-09-16T19:05:29.360Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20commerce
item.description: HCL Commerce's Remote Store server could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive personal information. The vulnerability requires the victim to first perform a particular operation on the website.

item.title: CVE-2022-27563|2024-09-16T16:48:58.039Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20versionvault%20express
item.description: An unauthenticated user can overload a part of HCL VersionVault Express and cause a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2021-27769|2024-09-16T16:52:51.973Z -- hcl%20software -- sametime
item.description: Information leakage occurs when a website reveals information that could aid an attacker to further exploit the system. This information may or may not be sensitive and does not automatically mean a breach is likely to occur. Overall, any information that could be used for an attack should be limited whenever possible.

item.title: CVE-2022-27549|2024-09-16T20:42:45.568Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20launch
item.description: HCL Launch may store certain data for recurring activities in a plain text format.

item.title: CVE-2021-27764|2024-09-16T19:09:03.206Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20webui
item.description: Cookie without HTTPONLY flag set. NUMBER cookie(s) was set without Secure or HTTPOnly flags. The images show the cookie with the missing flag. (WebUI)

item.title: CVE-2023-50347|2024-08-02T22:16:46.341Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an insecure SQL interface vulnerability, potentially giving an attacker the ability to execute custom SQL queries. A malicious user can run arbitrary SQL commands including changing system configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-45705|2024-08-02T20:29:32.503Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: An administrative user of WebReports may perform a Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF) exploit through SMTP configuration options.

item.title: CVE-2023-45715|2024-08-02T20:29:31.232Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: The console may experience a service interruption when processing file names with invalid characters.

item.title: CVE-2023-45706|2024-08-02T20:29:31.712Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: An administrative user of WebReports may perform a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) and/or Man in the Middle (MITM) exploit through SAML configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-45707|2024-08-02T20:29:32.276Z -- hcl%20software -- connections%20docs
item.description: HCL Connections Docs is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting attack where an attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code. This may lead to credentials disclosure and possibly launch additional attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-23576|2024-08-01T15:53:20.671Z -- hcl%20software -- commerce
item.description: Security vulnerability in HCL Commerce 9.1.12 and 9.1.13 could allow denial of service, disclosure of user personal data, and performing of unauthorized administrative operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-23584|2024-07-29T16:04:43.181Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20enterprise%20suite%20asset%20discovery
item.description: The NMAP Importer service​ may expose data store credentials to authorized users of the Windows Registry.

item.title: CVE-2023-50347|2024-07-29T16:16:24.140Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an insecure SQL interface vulnerability, potentially giving an attacker the ability to execute custom SQL queries. A malicious user can run arbitrary SQL commands including changing system configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-30126|2024-07-22T19:55:46.017Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20compliance
item.description: HCL BigFix Compliance is affected by a missing X-Frame-Options HTTP header which can allow an attacker to create a malicious website that embeds the target website in a frame or iframe, tricking users into performing actions on the target website without their knowledge.

item.title: CVE-2024-30130|2024-07-19T17:19:14.601Z -- hcl%20software -- nomad%20server%20on%20domino
item.description: HCL Nomad server on Domino is vulnerable to the cache containing sensitive information which could potentially give an attacker the ability to acquire the sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-30125|2024-07-19T17:23:51.769Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20compliance
item.description: HCL BigFix Compliance server can respond with an HTTP status of 500, indicating a server-side error that may cause the server process to die.

item.title: CVE-2024-30125|2024-07-18T17:59:48.338Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20compliance
item.description: The server responded with an HTTP status of 500, indicating a server-side error that may cause the server process to die.

item.title: CVE-2024-23540|2024-07-11T17:53:53.324Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20inventory
item.description: The HCL BigFix Inventory server is vulnerable to path traversal which enables an attacker to read internal application files from the Inventory server. The BigFix Inventory server does not properly restrict the served static file.

item.title: CVE-2024-23562|2024-07-10T14:56:59.899Z -- hcl%20software -- domino%20server
item.description: This vulnerability is being re-assessed. Vulnerability details will be updated. The security bulletin will be republished when further details are available.

item.title: CVE-2024-23588|2024-07-08T19:58:31.610Z -- hcl%20software -- nomad%20server%20on%20domino
item.description: HCL Nomad server on Domino fails to properly handle users configured with limited Domino access resulting in a possible denial of service vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-23562|2024-07-08T19:58:27.409Z -- hcl%20software -- domino%20server
item.description: A security vulnerability in HCL Domino could allow disclosure of sensitive configuration information. A remote unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain information to launch further attacks against the affected system.

item.title: CVE-2023-45715|2024-07-05T17:21:19.672Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: The console may experience a service interruption when processing file names with invalid characters.

item.title: CVE-2024-30111|2024-07-02T14:26:34.504Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20aex
item.description: HCL DRYiCE AEX product is impacted by Missing Root Detection vulnerability in the mobile application. The mobile app can be installed in the rooted device due to which malicious users can gain unauthorized access to the rooted devices, compromising security and potentially leading to data breaches or other malicious activities.

item.title: CVE-2024-30135|2024-06-28T07:22:28.386Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20aex
item.description: HCL DRYiCE AEX is potentially impacted by disclosure of sensitive information in the mobile application when a snapshot is taken.

item.title: CVE-2024-30109|2024-06-28T05:40:32.805Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20aex
item.description: HCL DRYiCE AEX is impacted by a lack of clickjacking protection in the AEX web application. An attacker can use multiple transparent or opaque layers to trick a user into clicking on a button or link on another page than the one intended.

item.title: CVE-2024-30112|2024-06-25T21:28:23.078Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting attack where an attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user which leads to executing malicious script code. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and comprise user's account then launch other attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-37541|2024-06-25T15:08:03.168Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections contains a broken access control vulnerability that may allow unauthorized user to update data in certain scenarios.

item.title: CVE-2024-30120|2024-06-17T15:01:45.319Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by an Unused Parameter in the web application.

item.title: CVE-2024-30119|2024-06-14T21:36:19.384Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by a missing Strict Transport Security Header. This could allow an attacker to intercept or manipulate data during redirection.

item.title: CVE-2024-30120|2024-06-14T21:44:54.474Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by an Unused Parameter in the web application.

item.title: CVE-2024-30107|2024-06-04T17:39:25.439Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections contains a broken access control vulnerability that may expose sensitive information to unauthorized users in certain scenarios.

item.title: CVE-2024-23558|2024-06-05T16:21:11.538Z -- hcl%20software -- devops%20deploy%20%2F%20launch
item.description: HCL DevOps Deploy / HCL Launch does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-23554|2024-06-06T14:12:30.589Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) on Session Token vulnerability that could potentially lead to Remote Code Execution (RCE).

item.title: CVE-2024-23579|2024-06-04T17:45:40.435Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by insecure encryption of security questions. This could allow an attacker with access to the database to recover some or all encrypted values.

item.title: CVE-2024-23580|2024-06-04T17:45:41.262Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by insecure encryption of One-Time Passwords (OTPs). This could allow an attacker with access to the database to recover some or all encrypted values.

item.title: CVE-2024-23559|2024-04-15T19:07:05.218Z -- hcl%20software -- devops%20deploy%20%2F%20launch
item.description: HCL DevOps Deploy / Launch is generating an obsolete HTTP header.

item.title: CVE-2024-23551|2024-05-07T21:46:54.285Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20compliance
item.description: Database scanning using username and password stores the credentials in plaintext or encoded format within files at the endpoint. This has been identified as a significant security risk. This will lead to exposure of sensitive information for unauthorized access, potentially leading to severe consequences such as data breaches, unauthorized data manipulation, and compromised system integrity.

item.title: CVE-2024-23584|2024-04-08T23:05:11.528Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20enterprise%20suite%20asset%20discovery
item.description: The NMAP Importer service​ may expose data store credentials to authorized users of the Windows Registry.

item.title: CVE-2024-23576|2024-05-13T21:28:44.325Z -- hcl%20software -- commerce
item.description: Security vulnerability in HCL Commerce 9.1.12 and 9.1.13 could allow denial of service, disclosure of user personal data, and performing of unauthorized administrative operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-23560|2024-04-15T19:22:57.295Z -- hcl%20software -- devops%20deploy%20%2F%20launch
item.description: HCL DevOps Deploy / HCL Launch could be vulnerable to incomplete revocation of permissions when deleting a custom security resource type.

item.title: CVE-2024-23583|2024-06-06T14:12:17.019Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: An attacker could potentially intercept credentials via the task manager and perform unauthorized access to the Client Deploy Tool on Windows systems.

item.title: CVE-2024-23540|2024-04-03T16:32:51.950Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20inventory
item.description: The HCL BigFix Inventory server is vulnerable to path traversal which enables an attacker to read internal application files from the Inventory server. The BigFix Inventory server does not properly restrict the served static file.

item.title: CVE-2024-23556|2024-06-06T14:11:00.413Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: SSL/TLS Renegotiation functionality potentially leading to DoS attack vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-23557|2024-04-18T18:21:18.690Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections contains a user enumeration vulnerability. Certain actions could allow an attacker to determine if the user is valid or not, leading to a possible brute force attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-23561|2024-04-15T20:35:08.416Z -- hcl%20software -- devops%20deploy%20%2F%20launch
item.description: HCL DevOps Deploy / HCL Launch is vulnerable to sensitive information disclosure vulnerability due to insufficient obfuscation of sensitive values.

item.title: CVE-2023-50347|2024-04-16T19:05:04.652Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an insecure SQL interface vulnerability, potentially giving an attacker the ability to execute custom SQL queries. A malicious user can run arbitrary SQL commands including changing system configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-45707|2024-06-10T12:58:32.745Z -- hcl%20software -- connections%20docs
item.description: HCL Connections Docs is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting attack where an attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code. This may lead to credentials disclosure and possibly launch additional attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-45706|2024-06-04T17:19:56.506Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: An administrative user of WebReports may perform a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) and/or Man in the Middle (MITM) exploit through SAML configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-45715|2024-03-28T14:26:32.839Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: The console may experience a service interruption when processing file names with invalid characters.

item.title: CVE-2023-45705|2024-06-04T17:20:04.534Z -- hcl%20software -- bigfix%20platform
item.description: An administrative user of WebReports may perform a Server Side Request Forgery (SSRF) exploit through SMTP configuration options.

item.title: CVE-2023-37526|2024-06-04T17:24:20.794Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20lucy
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Lucy (now AEX) is affected by a Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) vulnerability. The mobile app is vulnerable to a CORS misconfiguration which could potentially allow unauthorized access to the application resources from any web domain and enable cache poisoning attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-37539|2024-06-06T22:43:59.255Z -- hcl%20software -- domino%20server
item.description: The Domino Catalog template is susceptible to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. An attacker with the ability to edit documents in the catalog application/database created from this template can embed a cross site scripting attack. The attack would be activated by an end user clicking it.

item.title: CVE-2024-30119|2024-06-17T14:59:56.231Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by a missing Strict Transport Security Header. This could allow an attacker to intercept or manipulate data during redirection.

item.description: HCL DevOps Deploy / HCL Launch could be vulnerable to incomplete revocation of permissions when deleting a custom security resource type.

item.description: HCL Connections contains a broken access control vulnerability that may allow unauthorized user to update data in certain scenarios.

item.description: HCL DRYiCE AEX product is impacted by lack of input validation vulnerability in a particular web application. A malicious script can be injected into a system which can cause the system to behave in unexpected ways.

item.description: HCL DRYiCE AEX product is impacted by Missing Root Detection vulnerability in the mobile application. item.title: CVE-2024-30135|2024-08-02T01:25:02.994Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20aex
item.description: HCL DRYiCE AEX is potentially impacted by disclosure of sensitive information in the mobile application when a snapshot is taken.

item.title: CVE-2024-30107|2024-08-02T01:25:02.977Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections contains a broken access control vulnerability that may expose sensitive information to unauthorized users in certain scenarios.

item.title: CVE-2024-30109|2024-08-02T01:25:02.959Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20aex
item.description: HCL DRYiCE AEX is impacted by a lack of clickjacking protection in the AEX web application. An attacker can use multiple transparent or opaque layers to trick a user into clicking on a button or link on another page than the one intended.

item.title: CVE-2024-30119|2024-08-02T01:25:03.029Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20optibot%20reset%20station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by a missing Strict Transport Security Header. This could allow an attacker to intercept or manipulate data during redirection.

item.title: CVE-2024-30130|2024-08-02T01:25:03.056Z -- hcl%20software -- nomad%20server%20on%20domino
item.description: HCL Nomad server on Domino is vulnerable to the cache containing sensitive information which could potentially give an attacker the ability to acquire the sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-37526|2024-08-02T17:16:30.442Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20lucy
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Lucy (now AEX) is affected by a Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) vulnerability. The mobile app is vulnerable to a CORS misconfiguration which could potentially allow unauthorized access to the application resources from any web domain and enable cache poisoning attacks.

item.title: CVE-2023-37539|2024-08-02T17:16:30.571Z -- hcl%20software -- domino%20server
item.description: The Domino Catalog template is susceptible to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. An attacker with the ability to edit documents in the catalog application/database created from this template can embed a cross site scripting attack. The attack would be activated by an end user clicking it.

item.title: CVE-2023-37541|2024-08-02T17:16:30.496Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections contains a broken access control vulnerability that may allow unauthorized user to update data in certain scenarios.

item.title: CVE-2024-23557|2024-08-07T18:12:10.339Z -- hcl%20software -- connections
item.description: HCL Connections contains a user enumeration vulnerability. Certain actions could allow an attacker to determine if the user is valid or not, leading to a possible brute force attack.
